subject: [Lab 04] Q2: Summation
content:
Q2: Summation

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q2: Summation in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: I got a "name 'this_file' is not defined" error. What does this mean?

follow-ups.feedback: Sorry, there was a bug in an early skeleton, which has since been fixed. Either add `this_file = lab04.py` to the top of your `lab04.py` file or redownload the skeleton

threads.question: I keep getting this error and I'm not sure where my indentation is wrong on the def statement.  ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjkimypi2gxy2ll%2Fk10a3wukswiu%2FScreen_Shot_20190925_at_10.50.16_PM.png)

follow-ups.feedback: Make sure you are consistent with tabs and spaces, and make sure `def couple(s1, s2):` and the line before that one both have no tabs/spaces at the start.
